articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They were handed to Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Monday.

articles.title: Delegations of Chongryon Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegations of Chongryon Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Delegations of Koreans in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday to pay tribute to them. The delegations came here to participate in celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War
					 They included a delegation of the chairmen of branches of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Ho Myong Do, vice department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, delegation of officials of Chongryon headed by Pak Chun Se, vice-chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, delegation of educational officials of Chongryon led by Sin Kil Ung, principal of Tokyo Korean middle and high school, delegation of officials of the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan headed by Vice-Chairman Jo Jong Je, delegation of officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Nam Yu Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee, and delegation of the Korean Union of Democratic Women in Japan led by Ryang Ok Chul, vice-chairperson of the Central Standing Committee.
					
					 The members of the delegations placed bunches of flowers before the statues in humblest reverence for the peerlessly great men who made undying contributions to the development of Chongryon before paying tribute to them.
					
					 The delegations arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Zhang Wei-hua's Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Zhang Wei-hua's Family
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Monday received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Wei-hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean People's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Tsutomu Yamamoto, representative of the Shigoku Liaison Council for Japan-Korea Friendship, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Association
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Association
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association Monday sent a floral basket to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Order Commemorating 60th Anniversary of War Victory Awarded to New Songs
articles.content:
Order Commemorating 60th Anniversary of War Victory Awarded to New Songs 
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK published a decree on awarding the order commemorating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War to songs "July 27 March," "Holiday of great war victory", "Tell, fireworks of war victory" and "Respects to victors of great age" which were created to mark the anniversary.
					 The songs are an echo of the era of the Workers' Party of Korea reflecting the fixed will of the army and people to glorify for ages the undying history and traditions of war victory provided by the great Generalissimos. They also serve as an inspiring banner leading the army and people to the final victory, the decree said.
					
					 The SPA Presidium said the order is awarded to the songs to be remembered long in the distant future along with the shining history of the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK, songs of victors that reflect the stirring realities in the glorious Kim Jong Un era.

articles.title: Order of National Flag 1st Class Awarded to Creators of New Songs
articles.content:
Order of National Flag 1st Class Awarded to Creators of New Songs 
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK issued a decree Sunday on awarding Order of National Flag 1st Class to the creators of songs "July 27 March," "Holiday of great war victory", "Tell, fireworks of war victory" and "Respects to victors of great age" on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the war victory.
					 The decree said the order is awarded to creators of the State Merited Chorus and the Information and Publicity Department of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army who created hymns in the Songun era, songs of victors by displaying revolutionary and enterprising creating traits and enthusiasm, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's Juche-oriented policy of literature and arts, thereby instilling patriotism, spirit of defending the country, the will to annihilate enemies, confidence in final victory and optimism into the army and people.

articles.title: Title of Merited Artiste Awarded to Singer of Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Title of Merited Artiste Awarded to Singer of Moranbong Band
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Ryu Jin A, a singer of the Moranbong Band, was awarded the title of DPRK Merited Artiste.
					 She gave full play to her creative enthusiasm, guided by the Juche-oriented aesthetic views and idea on music and arts of the Workers' Party of Korea. She excellently sang songs reflecting the spirit of the Songun era, actively encouraging the army and people in their general march for the final victory in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A related decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was issued on Sunday.

articles.title: Grand Gymnastic, Artistic Performance "Arirang" Opens
articles.content:
Grand Gymnastic, Artistic Performance "Arirang" Opens
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, splendidly opened in May Day Stadium on Monday to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among the audience were Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and other officials of party, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions as well as service personnel, people in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin, vice premier of the Cabinet, made an opening speech.
					
					 When the light melodies of music "Our Victory-Day July 27" resounded through the stadium, letters reading "7. 27" and "60" were displayed on the foreground and background of the stadium.      Spectacular scenes were presented, depicting heroic soldiers during the Fatherland Liberation War backed by effects of the colorful light rhythms, lighting and flame fireworks.
					
					 The performers praised Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander and legendary hero who made a long journey of anti-Japanese bloody struggle and accomplished the historic cause of the national liberation and defeated the U.S. that boasted of being the "strongest" in the world. They also paid respects to the great war victors.
					
					 Striking a chord with the audience were the scenes showing the annals of the Songun revolution of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, who turned the DPRK into an invincible political and ideological power and a world-level military power and provided solid foundations for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The extravaganza was a perfect combination of music and dances rich in national flavor and excellent in the content and form like artistic skill, dynamic gymnastics and acrobatics, ever-changing background, gorgeous stage decor, electric settings, lighting, etc.
					
					 It was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Paeksong Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Paeksong Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A large number of people have visited the Paeksong Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 President Kim Il Sung stayed in Paeksong-ri in April, Juche 41 (1952), instilling into teachers and students of Kim Il Sung University confidence in victory and clearly indicating the way for the university to follow  and a prospect for postwar rehabilitation and construction.
					
					 He made a historic speech "The Prospects of the Fatherland Liberation War and the Tasks of the University" before its teachers and students.
					
					 He told them to conduct researches for postwar rehabilitation and construction, unearth and ascertain historical data and cultural treasures of Korea and train many able native cadres. 
					
					 He gave a precious instruction to all students to study hard in the same spirit as displayed on the front in response to the slogan "Study also means a battle!" before having a photo taken with them. 
					
					 The visitors presented bunches of flowers to his statue in the site before paying tribute to him. 
					
					 They made the rounds of the Paeksong Revolutionary Museum, the house where he had a talk, the main building of the university, dining room for students, dormitory of the Korean literature faculty, a farmer's house and so on.

articles.title: Book "Among the People" Vol. 102 Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Book "Among the People" Vol. 102 Published in DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House published book of memoirs "Among the People" Vol. 102 to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The book consists of 18 stories about undying exploits of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander and brilliant strategist who led the hard-fought war to victory, and his noble traits. 
					
					 Memoir "Immortal leadership in foiling the aggressive offensive of the U.S. imperialists" says that Kim Il Sung personally went to the forefront to wisely lead the struggle to make the U.S. imperialists be destined to fall like the setting sun. 
					
					 Other stories deal with the facts that he set forth the unique tactics to mercilessly destroy the U.S. imperialist aggressors and that he visited positions of anti-aircraft machine guns to give important instructions for firmly defending the air of the country.
					
					 The book says that he saw to it that military academy and training course for sergeant majors were set even in the wartime, Juche was firmly established in education and commanding officers took care of soldiers' living as their real elder brothers would do. 
					
					 Some other stories tell about the noble traits and undying exploits of Kim Il Sung who showed fatherly love for the soldiers and people in the rear so that they might perform feats.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Takes Van of Sacred War
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Takes Van of Sacred War
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- During the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953), President Kim Il Sung always found himself in the frontline area to lead the war to victory.
					 One day in July Juche 39 (1950) Kim Il Sung left for the Front Command in Seoul by jeep
					
					 The car reached the entrance to a bridge over the River Rimjin. But it could not cross the bridge because it was severed by the enemy's air bombing.
					
					 Kim Il Sung urged the driver to go across the river through the nearby railway bridge so as to lose no time to arrive in Seoul.
					
					 Upon his arrival in the Front Command, he taught detailed ways for smoothly implementing the operational plans for the first stage of the war and looked after the life of the servicepersons and Seoul citizens.
					
					 At the end of July, he went even to Suanbo, the foremost front, to personally command operations.
					
					 His inspection tours of frontline areas encouraged the servicepersons to perform heroic feats in battles against the enemy.

articles.title: Congratulations to King of Belgium
articles.content:
Congratulations to King of Belgium
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Philip upon his enthronement as king of Belgium.
					 In the message Kim expressed belief that bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would steadily develop.

articles.title: President of Guinea-Bissau Refers to Boosting Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
President of Guinea-Bissau Refers to Boosting Friendly Relations with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The president of Guinea-Bissau said he sincerely wished the Korean people bigger successes in their efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of the great HE Kim Jong Un. 
					 He said this when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to his country Kim Jun Gap on July 11.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK and Guinea-Bissau have long-standing fraternal relations of friendship and cooperation, the president added:
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung rendered material and moral support to the people of Guinea-Bissau in their struggle for national liberation and building new society.
					
					 The government and people of Guinea-Bissau always remember this, being thankful to him.
					
					 The DPRK is a powerful socialist state which has achieved signal successes in politics, economy and culture, and military affairs in particular.
					
					 I am convinced that the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties would grow stronger in various fields in the future.

articles.title: Romanian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Romanian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania headed by Vasile Orleanu, chairman of its Supreme Council, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Monday.
					 Being briefed on the undying revolutionary careers of the President and his family, the members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved there with good care.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said that Kim Il Sung dedicated all his life to the revolution, adding that the younger generation of the DPRK is deeply grasping his revolutionary history.

articles.title: Mosaics Portraying Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Different Units
articles.content:
Mosaics Portraying Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Different Units
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Mosaics portraying the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected at the Kumchol Co-op Farm in Hoeyang County, and the Sunhak Co-op Farm in Kosong County, Kangwon Province and Tongdaewon District in Pyongyang City.
					 Erected at the Kumchol Co-op Farm in Hoeyang County is mosaic "Leader! It's Forefront before You" depicting President Kim Il Sung inspecting the forefront for the victory in the war, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Sunhak Co-op Farm in Kosong County erected mosaic "Rich Harvest" dealing with  the exploits the Generalissimos performed by dedicating themselves to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.
					
					 People in Tongdaewon District erected mosaic "Great Motherland" portraying smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il visualizing the future of Juche Korea on Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The mosaics were unveiled with due ceremonies.

articles.title: WPK Congratulates Wangjaesan Art Troupe
articles.content:
WPK Congratulates Wangjaesan Art Troupe 
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee sent a congratulatory message to creators and artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe greeting its 30th anniversary. 
					 The troupe is an art organization of national value and exemplary one formed by leader Kim Jong Il on July 22, Juche 72 (1983). 
					
					 It has created and successfully performed many hymns praising the party and the leader as well as famous songs and dance pieces. It has made great contributions to giving wide publicity to the greatness of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and the advantages of Korean-style socialism and displaying over the world the might of the daily developing Juche art. 
					
					The WPK Central Committee praised the creators and artistes of the troupe for faithfully upholding the music policy of the party by devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm with pure loyalty and high sense of moral obligation for the party and the leader.

articles.title: Art Performance on Development of Mountainous County
articles.content:
Art Performance on Development of Mountainous County
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A performance of the art group of Changsong County, North Phyongan Province was given in Pyongyang some days ago.
					 The performance spoke highly of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who had made painstaking efforts to turn Changsong County, a remote mountainous area, into a well-off locality.
					
					 Put on its stage were narrative and chorus "The Leader Is Without Parallel in the World" and mixed duet and chorus "Changsong County Today", which represented ardent yearning for Kim Il Sung, who cared so much for the living of the county's inhabitants, tasting even acorn-made porridge on a visit to the county.
					
					 The narrative and chorus "Song of Love for People" and story-telling and song "Boundless Is Our Yearning" reflected the wish that that Kim Jong Il would visit the county to see its development.
					
					 Other numbers of the performance lively featured the characteristics of the county with high artistic skills.
					
					 The performance dropped its curtain with chorus "Ardent Desire", which reflected the pledge of the county's people to be intensely true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Corundum-made Products Widely Used
articles.content:
Corundum-made Products Widely Used
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Korea Pusong Corporation has made various kinds of products with corundum.
					 Among them are fireproof paints, grinders and bearings.
					
					 As they are highly adherent, the paints are very useful in casting.
					
					 The corundum grinder, low in production cost, is as strong as diamond grinder, and long in the serviceable life.
					
					 The corundum bearing can be used without supply of lubricant. The bearing has already proved effective in operating various kinds of machines.
					
					Corundum can be also applied to jewel cutting.
					
					 The corundum-made products won patent right and certificate at the 12th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies last year.
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is abundant with corundum resources.

articles.title: Torrential Rain Hits DPRK, Causing Flood Damage
articles.content:
Torrential Rain Hits DPRK, Causing Flood Damage
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Heavy rains have swept the central part of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, causing flood damage.
					 According to data available at the Hydro-meteorological Service, the precipitation, registered in 20 days after the start of this year's rainy season, is nearly twice the average rainfall in the month of July.
					
					 On July 20, the highest precipitation was recorded in Tongsin, Songwon, Ryongrim and Thaechon counties.
					
					 From 21:00 July 19 to 15:00 July 21, 413 mm rainfall was recorded in Tongsin County, 383 mm in Songwon County, 380 mm in Thaechon County, 322 mm in Huichon City, 312 mm in Hyangsan County, 304 mm in Tongchang County and over 200 mm in Kusong City, Sonchon and Nyongbyon counties and Tokchon City.
					
					 It rained 109 mm in Thaechon County and 68 mm in Hyangsan County from 06:00 to 09:00 July 20, 64 mm in Thaechon County and 63 mm in Tongchang County from 09:00 to 12:00, 66 mm in Unsan County from 10:15 to 12:00 and 102 mm in Sunchon City, 79 mm in Huichon City and 72 mm in Phyongwon County from 15:00 to 18:00.
					
					 The downpour-triggered flood left five people dead and 3 others missing from 18:00 July 17 to 18:00 July 20.
					
					 The flood destroyed or submerged more than 6 060 dwelling houses throughout the country, with 3 120 in North Phyongan Province and 2 800 in South Phyongan Province, leaving some 23 770 people homeless.
					
					 Several hundred hectares of cropland were inundated or buried in North Phyongan Province and North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The heavy rain damaged 6 330 meters of roads in Yangdok County, South Phyongan Province.

articles.title: Independent Reunification of Country Urged by Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independent Reunification of Country Urged by Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation should achieve the national reunification independently by its concerted efforts no matter what.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article on Monday.
					
					 Koreans can not see a proper solution to issues of the inter-Korean relations and the national reunification if they rely on the foreign forces, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. divided Korea into two out of a brigandish ambition to occupy the whole territory of Korea with south Korea as a springboard and has persisted in the vicious hostile policy towards the north.
					
					 It is obvious that the outsiders who divided Korea can not help Koreans reunify the country.
					
					 Korea's reunification is a matter pertaining to the Korean nation itself and its sovereignty.
					
					 It is a treacherous act against the reunification to depend on outsiders and conspire with them, not trying to solve the issue of reunification by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 The present ruling quarters of south Korea are attaching more importance to outsiders than to compatriots and confronting the compatriots in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 This rash act will ruin the north-south relations and bring a war.
					
					 The only way for the Korean nation to improve the north-south relations and achieve the national unity and reunification is to abide by the principle of national independence.
					
					 When all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad pool the patriotic will and minds under the banner of "By our nation itself" and keep pace with each other, a favorable phase for independent reunification would be provided.
					
					 No one can dampen the desire and demand of the Korean nation to reject the aggressive outsiders and reunify the country on the principle of national independence.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Embellishing Wartime Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Embellishing Wartime Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are busy with the preparations for the "event in celebration of the 60th anniversary of the ceasefire" by enlisting the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of National Defence, Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency and others.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This is a farce to cover up their disgrace as a loser in the war and whitewash its unpardonable crime of invading the north.
					
					 The authorities, working as dirty stooges of the foreign forces, ignited a war against the north and had been hell-bent on slaughtering compatriots only to suffer the most shameful defeat in history. No matter how desperately they may try to distort the history by describing the Korean war as the north's invasion of the south, they can not conceal their wretched plight as loser.
					
					 This farce is aimed at provoking another war against the north. 
					
					 Their smear campaign and false publicity of portraying their defeat as "victory" would betray their miserable nature of provocateur and loser.
					
					 The south Korean authorities and the U.S. imperialists should draw a due lesson from the defeat in the Korean war and discontinue the criminal act of escalating confrontation with the compatriots.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Move to Introduce Latest Type Missiles
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Move to Introduce Latest Type Missiles 
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean bellicose forces are now mulling introducing 206 units of AIM-120C-7, advanced medium range air-to-air missiles, from the U.S.
					 The projected import of this weaponry is reportedly worth 452 million dollars.
					
					 They plan to equip their mainstay F-15K of the air force and the latest type fighters to be introduced from the U.S. with these missiles 
					
					 As regards south Korea's requested sale of weapons, the U.S. claimed its clinching of arms sale deal is in line with the goal of its diplomatic policy and national interests 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are now working hard to introduce offensive weapons from the U.S. in a bid to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK any time.

articles.title: Actions Staged for Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration, Conclusion of Peace Treaty
articles.content:
Actions Staged for Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration, Conclusion of Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Pro-reunification organizations in south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty staged a 72-hour action in Seoul from July 19 to 21 to demand the implementation of the north-south joint declaration and the conclusion of a peace treaty.
					 The action began with a press conference in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul on July 19.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference said that dark clouds of the Cold War are still hanging heavily over the Korean Peninsula though six decades have passed since the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities have persisted in their hostile policy towards the DPRK, blocking peace and reunification on the peninsula.
					
					 Independent reunification is the only way to be followed by the Korean nation.
					
					 It is only south Korea in the world where foreign troops have been present for nearly seven decades.
					
					 An end should be put to the U.S. military presence in south Korea as it is the root cause of national division and sufferings. A decisive phase of peaceful reunification would be opened at the moment the U.S. forces are withdrawn and a peace treaty is concluded on the peninsula.
					
					 The speakers were vocal criticizing the present authorities for denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They held that the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone should be normalized as soon as possible, tour of Mt. Kumgang resumed and the reunion of the separated families and their relatives realized.
					
					 At the end of the conference the participants gathered in front of the "government" building and held a meeting demanding the unconditional resumption of dialogue between the north and the south and implementation of the joint declaration.
					
					 They held a press conference near Chongwadae slamming the puppet authorities for going reckless to bring the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and deny the joint declaration.
					
					 While the action was under way press conferences, meetings and signature campaigns took place in various parts of Seoul including Kwanghwamun and U.S. military base in Ryongsan.

articles.title: S. Korean Professors Denounce IS for Its Interference in Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Professors Denounce IS for Its Interference in Election
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Professors of the Broadcasting Correspondence Course College of south Korea on July 18 issued a declaration on the situation denouncing the puppet Intelligence Service (IS) for its interference in the election.
					 They said:
					
					 The IS committed politically-motivated interference on a wide scale because power was excessively concentrated upon the IS and there was no control over it.
					
					 The chief executive instructed the IS, an  entity to be reformed, to present "a plan for reform". This was a wrong judgment prompted by the lack of understanding of the gravity of the situation.
					
					 The IS's action can never be pardoned and the truth behind the unreasonable politically-motivated interference should be probed at any cost.
					
					 Those who were involved in the criminal action of the IS and attempted to play down and cover up it should face a stern judgment by law.
					
					 The case of the IS was not just a crime committed by the director of the IS and a few individual staff members but an organized criminal action.

articles.title: GIs' Killing of Civilians during Korean War under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
GIs' Killing of Civilians during Korean War under Fire in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place on the spot on July 18 to remember the civilians mercilessly killed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors in Rogun-ri, Yongdong County, North Chungchong Province of south Korea during the past Korean War.
					 The representative of the Unified Progressive Party, an                opposition party of south Korea, said at the meeting that the number of civilians killed in south Korea including Rogun-ri before and after the past June 25 war exceeded a million.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. did not officially apologize to the bereaved families yet, claiming that GIs' killing of civilians at that time was accidental and the "government" also has taken no measure for reparation.
					
					 The number of those recognized as victims by the south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation was just over 15 000 persons.
					
					 He accused the "government" of refusing to own responsibility for all the remaining victims as the Supreme Court announced that it is hard to apply for reparation unless one goes through the required procedures now that the activities of this organization are over.
					
					 He held that a long time has passed since then, but the "government" should unearth remains, probe truth about cases, make proper reparation and take a measure against the recurrence of such cases.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Call for Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Call for Peace on Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting of overseas Koreans supporting peace on the Korean Peninsula took place in Moscow on Saturday under the sponsorship of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia. 
					 Attending it were representatives of overseas Koreans' organizations in Asia, Europe and America, including the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the General Association of Koreans in China and the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., and other overseas Koreans, those related to the Russia-Korea Friendship Association and Russian experts on the Korean issue. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Russia, and staff members of his embassy and a delegation of the Committee for Overseas Koreans also participated in the meeting. 
					
					 Prior to the meeting the participants watched the Korean documentary "Chieftain of Korean War" disclosing the aggressive nature of the U.S. imperialists who ignited the June 25 war. 
					
					 Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans and chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, made a report to be followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers stressed the need to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and force the U.S. imperialist aggressors to withdraw from south Korea as early as possible to settle the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula and achieve peace, stability and Korea's reunification at an early date. 
					
					 They called for thoroughly implementing the line and policies for achieving the peaceful reunification of Korea put forward by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the north-south joint declarations to ensure peace on the peninsula and attain prosperity and development common to the nation by concerted efforts of Koreans. 
					
					 Experts on the Korean issue of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences and other personages also made speeches there.
					
					 The Cold War is still persisting on the Korean Peninsula because the U.S. has kept its huge forces in south Korea, deliberately disturbing atmosphere of ceasefire and evading the conclusion of a peace treaty for the last six decades, they said. 
					
					 They urged the U.S. to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK at an early date. 
					
					 A declaration marking the 60th anniversary of the adoption of the Armistice Agreement was read out at the meeting. 
					
					 It said that peace has not settled on the Korean Peninsula though 60 years have passed since the ceasefire. 
					
					 There took place many meetings, talks and dialogues and agreements were reached between the north and the south of Korea and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration signed by the top leaders of the north and the south were published. However, hurdles still remain in the way of defusing tension and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula, it said, and went on:
					
					 Whenever the north and the south adopted agreements at the summit talks and multi-faceted dialogues and opted to implement them, the U.S. put brakes on those efforts. 
					
					 The U.S. has put pressure upon the south Korean ruling forces, politics, economy and all other social fields. It staged joint military drills simulating a nuclear attack on the DPRK every year, further straining the situation on the peninsula. 
					
					 The declaration ardently called upon all the overseas Koreans to fully support the proposal of the DPRK for concluding a peace treaty and turn out in the actions for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea, proceeding from the concern about the grave situation on the peninsula. 
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting an art performance and reception were given by the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Meeting of Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Meeting of Overseas Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting of overseas Koreans supporting the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 In the letter, the participants expressed support for the proposal of the DPRK to hold high-level talks between the authorities of the DPRK and the U.S. to defuse the tension on the peninsula and ensure peace and stability in the region. 
					
					 They paid the highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who dedicated their noble lives to the struggle for achieving the country's reunification and peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 They said they are of the view that it is a just way of protecting the sovereignty and independence of the DPRK to steadily bolster up the defense capability while further developing the economic potential of the DPRK to improve the wellbeing of the Korean people.
					
					 They expressed their resolution to always stand by the people in the homeland in their efforts to bring earlier the country's reunification and ensure peace on the peninsula and get louder voices demanding the conclusion of a peace treaty heard in different parts of the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits in War Praised by Newspapers of Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits in War Praised by Newspapers of Various Countries
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries dedicated special write-ups to the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The July 3-10 issue of the Russian newspaper Khabarovski Ekspres allotted one whole page to photos of President Kim Il Sung and the dear respected Kim Jong Un and articles under various titles.
					
					 The newspaper in an article titled "Day of the Korean people's victory" said:
					
					 It occupies a particular page in the world history of wars that the young DPRK brought the U.S. to his knees though it boasted of being "the strongest" in the world.
					
					 The Korean people's victory in the war would have been unthinkable without the superb commanding art of the President.
					
					 The service personnel of the Korean People's Army emerged strong in faith and performers of heroic feats and no force on earth can match such army and people.
					
					 Clark, commander of the "UN Forces", who signed the Korean Armistice Agreement little short of a document of surrender on July 27, 1953 admitted that it was thanks to the skilled command of Kim Il Sung that the army of north Korea achieved successes.
					
					 The President's exploits performed for victory in the war will shine forever.
					
					 The newspaper in an article titled "The battle recorded in the history of the DPRK" introduced in detail the battle for liberating Taejon, an example of the modern siege warfare, adding that a lot of military miracles were wrought in the past Korean war.
					
					 The July issue of the Peruvian newspaper Accion Nacionalista carried an article disclosing the true colors of the U.S. as a provoker of the Korean war.
					
					 The Nepalese newspaper Majodur on July 15 in an article titled "U.S. moves against the DPRK" recalled that the U.S. has ceaselessly made a nuclear war drumbeat against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Peruvian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Peruvian Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea on July 16 released a joint statement to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The statement said:
					
					 July 27 this year is a significant day marking the 60th anniversary of the brilliant victory of the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the Fatherland Liberation War under the wise leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 On this auspicious holiday, the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea pay the highest tribute to the Generalissimo who led the war to victory and brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for U.S. imperialism.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an outstanding strategist and an invincible and iron-willed commander who shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The exploits he performed by leading the war to victory will shine forever along with the century.
					
					 The tradition of victory won by him in the hard-fought war against the invasion of U.S. imperialism was steadfastly carried forward by the Songun politics of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and is now given steady continuity under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The progressive parties, organizations and people in Peru are convinced that the service personnel and people of the DPRK who have Kim Jong Un, brilliant commander of Songun, as Supreme Commander of the revolutionary armed forces will mercilessly foil the provocations of the U.S. imperialists and certainly achieve a final victory.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Peruvian Organizations
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War Observed by Peruvian Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Peruvian Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples posted a joint article titled "Wise leadership, great victory" on a website on July 15.
					 The article said:
					
					 July 27 this year marks the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, great commander and strategist, defeated Japanese imperialism by waging the protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle and saved the Korean people from the yoke of colonial slavery.
					
					 He also beat back the invasion by brigandish U.S. imperialism and protected the sovereignty of the country and nation.
					
					 The Korean people's victory in the war is a fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 We are pleased to celebrate July 27 as a day of great victory in the struggle against imperialism and the U.S., together with the Korean people.
					
					 We extend our warm congratulations to the Korean people on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of their victory in the war.

articles.title: DPRK Supported by Foreign Personage
articles.content:
DPRK Supported by Foreign Personage
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, contributed an article titled "Might of People's Korea" to the recent issue of a Jordanian paper.
					 The DPRK led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un has frustrated the moves of aggression by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The U.S. is afraid of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un. Why? It is because the DPRK is fully ready for confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will emerge victorious in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 Recently the deputy spokesman for the UN Secretary General made it clear that the Unite Nations didn't command any units during the Korean war in the 1950s nor played any role in commanding forces deployed in Korea.
					
					 This clarification was like a bolt from the blue to the U.S. which has floated for decades an absurd story that the "UN Forces" have been deployed in south Korea to protect it from the possible attack from the DPRK.
					
					 This also proves that the U.S. imperialists make whatever lies to realize its ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 However, its policy of strength toward the DPRK has ended up in failure.
					
					 The U.S. will have to admit the stark reality.

articles.title: Concedida orden conmemorativa a nuevas canciones creadas por 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra
articles.content:
Concedida orden conmemorativa a nuevas canciones creadas por 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto emitido el dia 21 por el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue concedida la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o Aniversario del Triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria a las canciones creadas con motivo de la misma efemeride "Marcha del 27 de Julio", "Fiesta de la gran victoria en guerra", "Cuentenlo, los fuegos artificiales de festejo de la victoria en guerra" y "Homenaje a los triunfadores de la gran decada".
					Las canciones citadas son ecos de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, que demuestran la conviccion y voluntad de esta organizacion, el ejercito y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de hacer brillar de generacion en generacion la historia y la tradicion de la victoria en guerra, preparadas por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, apunta el decreto.
					
					Ademas, constituyen la bandera que estimula a todo el ejercito y el pueblo al 27 de Julio de victoria final, destaca.
					
					Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la victoria en guerra, el Presidium de la APS otorga la orden referida a las nuevas canciones de recuerdos y triunfadores que seran eternas junto con la historia de la direccion del PTC sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun por haber interpretado excelentemente el impetu de la gloriosa era de Kim Jong Un, finaliza.

articles.title: Otorgada Orden Bandera Nacional a los creadores de nuevas canciones
articles.content:
Otorgada Orden Bandera Nacional a los creadores de nuevas canciones 
						
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto emitido el dia 21 por el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue concedida la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a los creadores de las canciones "Marcha del 27 de Julio", "Fiesta de la gran victoria en guerra", "Cuentenlo, los fuegos artificiales de festejo de la victoria en guerra" y "Homenaje a los triunfadores de la gran decada", dedicadas al 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					El decreto especifica que los condecorados son 6 creadores del Coro Estatal Benemerito y el jefe de seccion de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la victoria en guerra, ellos crearon con su revolucionario y emprendedor modo de trabajo y gran pasion, en pleno acato a la autoctona politica de literatura y arte del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, esos himnos de la era del Songun y canciones de triunfadores que siembran en todo el ejercito y pueblo el calido patriotismo, el espiritu de defensa a la patria, el animo de aniquilar a los enemigos, la conviccion y optimismo de la victoria final.

articles.title: Inaugurada funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang"
articles.content:
Inaugurada funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang"
						
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 60o aniversario del triunfo del pueblo coreano en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, quedo inaugurada con solemnidad el dia 22 en el Estadio Primero de Mayo la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					La vieron Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, los funcionarios del partido, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de esta capital, compatriotas en ultramar y huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El vicepremier Kim Yong Jin pronuncio el discurso inaugural.
					
					Cuando repercutio la melodia ligera de "27 de julio, dia de la victoria", se dibujaron en la cancha de estadio y la pizarra humana las letras tales como "27 de julio" y "60" y se mostraron las escenas de figuras de soldados heroes de la epoca de la guerra y diversos efectos de luz y fuegos artificiales.
					
					Los ejecutantes encomiaron las inmortales proezas del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, genial comandante de acero y heroe legendario, quien libero a Corea del coloniaje japones mediante la enconada lucha armada antijaponesa y vencio al imperialismo yanqui que se jactaba de la "supremacia" mundial.
					
					Y rindieron homenaje a los triunfadores de la gran decada (1950-1953).
					
					Dejaron profundamente impresionados a los espectadores las escenas alusivas a la cronica de actividades revolucionarias del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien convirtio a Corea en invencible potencia ideo-politica y la militar de talla mundial y sento la solida base de construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					La funcion de fuerte matiz nacional y gran habilidad artistica arranco efusiva ovacion de los espectadores por haber combinado perfectamente las musicas, danzas, gimnasia y circo, la pizarra humana en constante cambio, los originales aparatos de escenografia, los aparatos de iluminacion electrica, etc.

articles.title: Otorgado a Ryu Jin A titulo de Actriz Benemerita
articles.content:
Otorgado a Ryu Jin A titulo de Actriz Benemerita
						
　Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto fechado 21 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue otorgado a Ryu Jin A,  cantante de la Banda Moranbong el titulo de Actriz Benemerita de la RPDC.
					　Armada firmemente con la concepcion estetica y la original idea de musica y arte del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, ella describio con pasion creadora las canciones en que palpita el aliento de la epoca del Songun y contribuyo mucho a estimular al ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC que se han levantado por lograr la victoria final en la construccion de una potencia prospera socialista.

articles.title: Se aumentan danos en RPDC por inundacion
articles.content:
Se aumentan danos en RPDC por inundacion
						
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Por la influencia del frente de estacion de lluvias, en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea esta lloviendo mucho cada dia.
					De acuerdo con el aviso de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica, durante 20 dias ultimos desde el inicio de la estacion de lluvias de este ano, la precipitacion promedio en los puntos de observacion meteorologica a lo largo del pais llego casi al doble de la promedio de julio.
					
					Sobre todo, en los distritos de Tongsin, Songwon, Ryongrim y Thaechon se registro el dia 20 la mayor precipitacion en comparacion con el mismo dia anterior.
					
					Especificamente, desde las 21:00 del dia 19 hasta las 15:00 del 21, cayo 413 mm de lluvias en el distrito de Tongsin; 383 mm en el de Songwon; 380 mm en el de Thaechon; 322 mm en la ciudad de Huichon; 312 mm en el distrito de Hyangsan; 304mm en el de Tongchang, y mas de 200 mm en algunas localidades como la ciudad de Kusong, el distrito de Sonchon, el de Nyongbyon y la ciudad de Tokchon.
					
					Entre las 6:00 y 9:00 del dia 20, cayo 109 mm de lluvias en el distrito de Thaechon y 68 mm en el de Hyangsan;  entre las 9:00 y 12:00, 64 mm en el distrito de Thaechon y 63 mm en el de Tongchang; entre las 10:15 y la mediodia, 66 mm en el distrito de Unsan; entre las 15:00 y 18:00, 102 mm en la ciudad de Sunchon, 79 mm en la ciudad de Huichon y 72 mm en el distrito de Phyongwon.
					
					Como resultado, se aumentan los danos por inundacion en varias localidades.
					
					Entre las 18:00 del dia 17 y las 18:00 del 20 murieron 5 personas y otras 3 desaparecieron.
					
					Quedaron destruidos o sumergidos mas de 3120 edificios de viviendas en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y mas de 2800 en la de Phyong-an del Sur, en total mas de 6060 edificios de viviendas en todo el pais.
					
					Mas de 23 mil 770 habitantes quedaron fuera de viviendas.
					
					En las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte y Hwanghae del Norte y otras localidades fueron sumergidos o enterrados cientos hectareas de arrozales y campos de secano.
					
					En el distrito de Yangdok de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur se destruyo la carretera de 6 mil 330 metros.
